name: pnp-list-empty-folders-on-site
title: List empty folders on a site (for multiple libraries)
shortDescription: Lists the empty folders for each library on a specific site.
longDescription: This script lists all the empty folders for each library on a specific site. This can be useful for Governance, especially with the number of libraries we can create in SharePoint.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
